Emitter configuration

PropertyRequiredDescriptionDefault value
classNameRequiredThe classname of the class which implements com.inmobi.stats.StatsEmitter The value  
should be com.inmobi.stats.emitter.EmitMondemand in case of mondemand		-

Mondemand (com.inmobi.stats.emitter.EmitMondemand) configuration propertes

emit_addressOptionalThe host address to emit to.224.1.1.11
emit_portOptionalThe port to emit to.9191
poll_intervalOptionalThe time in milli seconds for polling for stats10000
app_nameOptionalThe app name of the emittersample_app

Text Emitter (com.inmobi.messaging.util.TextStatsEmitter) configuration propertes

text.emitter.poll.intervalOptionalThe time in milli seconds for polling for stats10000
text.emitter.statspathOptionalThe directory in which stat files will be created.(pwd)
text.emitter.append.statsOptionalWhether append the stats in file or just overwrite. If true stats will be appended, if false stats will be overwrittentrue
